Verses: 1 ezhaigalai Vazhakkile Thorkappannavum, En Janaththil Sirumaiyaanavargalin Nyaayaththaip Purattavum, Vidhavaigalai Sooraiyaadavum, Thikkatra Pillaigalaik Kollaiyidavum,
2 aniyaayamaana Theerppugalai Seygiravargalukkum, Kodumaiyaana Kattalaigalai Ezhudhugiravargalukkum Aiyo!
3 visaarippin Naalilum, Dhooraththilirundhu Varum Paazhkkadippin Naalilum Neengal Ennaseyveergal? Udhaviperumpadi Yaaridaththil Oduveergal? Ungal Magimaiyai Enge Vaiththu Viduveergal?
4 kattundavargalinkeezh Mudanginaalozhiya Kolaiseyyappattavargalukkul Vizhuvaargal; Ivaiyellaavatrilum Avarudaiya Kobam Aaraamal, Innum Avarudaiya Kai Neettinapadiye Irukkiradhu.
5 en Kobaththin Kolaagiya Aseeriyanukku Aiyo! Avan Kaiyilirukkiradhu En Sinaththin Thandaayudham.

6 avabakthiyaana Janangalukku Virodhamaai Naan Avanai Anuppi, Enakkuk Kobamoottina Janaththaikkollaiyidavum, Sooraiyaadavum, Adhai Veedhigalin Setraippol Midhiththuppodavum Avanukkuk Kattalaikoduppen.
7 avano Appadi Ennugiradhumillai, Avan Irudhayam Appadippattadhai Ninaikkiradhumillai; Anegam Jaadhigalai Azhikkavum, Sangarikkavume Than Manadhile Ninaivukollugiraan.
8 avan: En Prabukkal Anaivarum Raajaakkalallavo?
9 kalno Pattanam Karkemisaippolaanadhillaiyo? Aamaadh Arpaaththaippolaanadhillaiyo? Samaariyaa Thamaskuvaippolaanadhillaiyo?
10 erusalemaiyum Samaariyaavaiyum Paarkkilum Viseshiththa Silaigalulla Vikkiraga Raajyangalai En Kai Kandupidiththirukka,
11 naan Samaariyaavukkum, Adhin Vikkiragangalukkum Seydhadhupol, Erusalemukkum Adhin Vikkiragangalukkum Seyyaamaliruppeno Endru Sollugiraan.

12 aadhalaal: Aandavar Seeyon Malaiyilum Erusalemilum Thamadhu Seyalaiyellaam Mudiththirukkumpodhu, Aseeriya Raajaavinudaiya Perumaiyaana Nenjin Vinaiyaiyum, Avan Kangalin Mettimaiyaana Paarvaiyaiyum Naan Visaarippen Engiraar.

13 avan: En Kaiyin Belaththinaalum, En Gnaanaththinaalum Idhaichcheydhen; Naan Buththimaan, Naan Janangalin Ellaigalai Maatri, Avargal Pandagasaalaigalaik Kollaiyittu Vallavanaippol Kudigalaith Thaazhththinen.

14 oru Kuruvikkoottaik Kandupidikkiradhupola En Kai Janangalin Aasthiyaik Kandupidiththadhu; Vittuvidappatta Muttaigalai Vaarikkolvadhupol Boomiyaiyellaam Naan Vaarikkonden; Oruvarum Settaiyai Asaiththadhumillai, Vaayaith Thirandhadhumillai, Keechchendru Saththamittadhumillai Endru Sollugiraan.

15 kodariyaanadhu Thannaal Vettugiravanukku Virodhamaai Menmai Paaraattalaamo? Vaalaanadhu Thannaik Kaiyaadugiravanukku Virodhamaaip Perumaipaaraattalaamo? Paaraattinaal, Thadiyaanadhu Thannaip Pidiththavanai Mirattinaarpolavum, Kolaanadhu Naan Marakkattaiyallavendru Ezhumbinaarpolavum Irukkume.
16 aagaiyaal Senaigalin Aandavaraagiya Karththar, Avanaichcherndha Kozhuththavargalukkulle Ilaippai Anuppuvaar; Patchikkum Akkiniyaippolum Oru Akkiniyai Avan Magimaiyinkeezh Koluththuvaar.
17 isravelin Oliyaanavar Akkiniyum, Adhin Parisuththar Akkinijuvaalaiyumaagi, Orenaalile Avanudaiya Mutchedigalaiyum, Nerinjilgalaiyum Thagiththup Patchiththu,
18 avanudaiya Vanaththin Magimaiyaiyum, Avanudaiya Payirnilaththin Magimaiyaiyum, Ullum Purambumaai Azhiyappannuvaar; Kodipidikkiravan Kalaiththu Vizhuvadhupolaagum.
19 kaattil Avanukku Meedhiyaana Marangal Konjamaayirukkum, Oru Sirupillai Avaigalai Enni Ezhudhalaam.

20 akkaalaththile Isravelil Meedhiyaanavargalum, Yaakkobin Vamsaththil Thappinavargalum, Pinnorupodhum Thangalai Adiththavanai Saarndhukollaamal, Isravelin Parisuththaraagiya Karththaraiye Unmaiyaai Saarndhukolvaargal.
21 meedhiyaayiruppavargal, Yaakkobil Meedhiyaayiruppavargale, Vallamaiyulla Dhevanidaththil Thirumbuvaargal.
22 isravele, Un Janangal Samuththiraththin Manalaththanaiyaayirundhaalum, Avargalil Meedhiyaayiruppavargalmaaththiram Thirumbuvaargal; Theermaanikkappatta Azhivu Niraindha Needhiyode Puranduvarum.
23 senaigalin Karththaraagiya Aandavar Dhesaththukkullengum Theermaanikkappatta Azhivai Varachcheyvaar.
24 aagaiyaal Seeyonil Vaasamaayirukkira En Janame, Aseeriyanukku Bayappadaadhe; Avan Unnaikkolaal Adiththu, Egipthiyaraippol Than Thandaayudhaththai Unmel Onguvaan.
25 aanaalum Innum Konjakkaalaththukkulle En Ukkiramum, Avargalai Sangarikkappogiradhinaal En Kobamum Theerndhupom Endru Senaigalinkarththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiraar.
26 orep Kanmalaiyandaiyile Meedhiyaaniyar Vettundadhupol Senaigalin Karththar Avan Mel Oru Savukkai Ezhumbivarappanni, Egipthile Thamadhu Kolaik Kadalinmel Onginadhupol Adhai Avanmel Onguvaar.
27 annaalil Un Tholinindru Avan Sumaiyum, Un Kazhuththinindru Avan Dhukkamum Neekkappadum; Abishegaththin Nugam Murindhupom.
28 avan Aayaaththukku Vandhu, Mikronaik Kadandhu, Mikmaasile Than Rasthukkalai Vaiththirukkiraan.
29 kanavaayaith Thaandi, Kebaavile Paalayamirangugiraargal; Raamaa Adhirgiradhu; Savulin Ooraagiya Kibiyaa Odippogiradhu.
30 kaalim Kumaaraththiye, Uraththasaththamaaik Kooppidu; Ezhai Aana Thoththe, Laayeesh Oormattum Ettasaththamittuk Kooppidu.
31 madhmenaa Valasaivaangippom, Kebimin Kudigal Thappiodak Koottankoodugiraargal.
32 ini Orunaal Nopile Thangi, Seeyon Kumaaraththiyin Parvadhaththukkum, Erusalemin Mettukkum Virodhamaaik Kaineetti Mirattuvaan.
33 idho, Senaigalin Karththaraagiya Aandavar Thoppugalai Bayangaramaai Vettuvaar; Ongi Valarndhavaigal Vettundu Mettimaiyaanavaigal Thaazhththappadum.
34 avar Kaattin Adarththiyaik Kodariyinaal Vettippoduvaar; Magaththuvamaanavaraale Leebanon Vizhum.
